data.name: ProtocolSpecificEntities
DeleteAllApplicationSettings
data.value: DELETE FROM [ApplicationsSettings] WHERE [ApplicationId] = @appId

data.name: TrackData_DropIndex
data.value: Drop Index [TrackData].[TrackData_Index];

data.name: MessageParameters_Messages_FKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [MessageParameters] ADD CONSTRAINT [MessageParameters_Messages_FKey] FOREIGN KEY ([MessageId]) REFERENCES [Messages] ([Id]) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION;

data.name: ApplicationsToken
GetSettingsForApplication
data.value: SELECT [Name], [Value] FROM [ApplicationsSettings] WHERE [ApplicationId] = @appId

data.name: BaseDevicesXml_PKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [BaseDevicesXml] ADD CONSTRAINT [PKey] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]);

data.name: GetSettingsNamesForApplication
data.value: SELECT [Name] FROM [ApplicationsSettings] WHERE [ApplicationId] = @appId

data.name: SelectMessages
data.value: SELECT [Id],[Class],[Type],[TimeStamp],[State],[AppId],[AddInVersion],[DeviceIds],[CapabilityIds] FROM [Messages]

data.name: ProtocolSpecificEntities_PKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [ProtocolSpecificEntities] ADD CONSTRAINT [ProtocolSpecificEntities_PKey] PRIMARY KEY (ProtocolId,DataId, SubId);

data.name: ConfigurationVariables
LocationsXml_PKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [LocationsXml] ADD CONSTRAINT [PKey] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]);

data.name: ApplicationsSettings
TechnicalConfigurations_PKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [TechnicalConfigurations] ADD CONSTRAINT [TechnicalConfigurations_PKey] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]);

data.name: UtilityData_PKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [UtilityData] ADD CONSTRAINT [PKey] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]);

data.name: UtilityData
data.value: CREATE TABLE [UtilityData] ( [Id] INT IDENTITY NOT NULL, [EntityId] NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, [MeterId] NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, [Timestamp] DATETIME NOT NULL, [UtilityType] TINYINT NOT NULL, [Value] INT NOT NULL, [Data] NVARCHAR(50) );

data.name: LogicalDevicesXml_PKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [LogicalDevicesXml] ADD CONSTRAINT [PKey] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]);

data.name: LocationsXml
TrackData_AlterEntityId
data.value: Alter Table [TrackData] Alter Column [EntityId] nvarchar(100);

data.name: UtilityData_Index
data.value: CREATE INDEX [UtilityData_Index] ON [UtilityData] ([MeterId], [UtilityType]);

data.name: BaseDevicesXml
MessageParameters_PKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [MessageParameters] ADD CONSTRAINT [MessagesParameters_PKey] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]);

data.name: DeviceActivityLogs
data.value: CREATE TABLE [DeviceActivityLogs] ( [Id] INT IDENTITY NOT NULL, [ActivityType] INT NOT NULL, [DeviceId] NVARCHAR(80), [NewState] NTEXT NOT NULL, [Timestamp] DATETIME NOT NULL, [EventType] INT NOT NULL );

data.name: ConfigurationVariables_PKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [ConfigurationVariables] ADD CONSTRAINT [PKey] PRIMARY KEY ([Name]);

data.name: SelectMessagesByClassAndType
data.value: SELECT [Id],[Class],[Type],[TimeStamp],[State],[AppId],[AddInVersion],[DeviceIds],[CapabilityIds] FROM [Messages] WHERE [Class]=@MessageClass AND [Type] LIKE @MessageType

data.name: Messages_PKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [Messages] ADD CONSTRAINT [Messages_PKey] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]);

data.name: InteractionsXml
HomeSetupsXml
GetMessagesByParamValue
data.value: SELECT m.[Id], m.[Class], m.[Type], m.[TimeStamp], m.[State] FROM [Messages] AS m INNER JOIN [MessageParameters] AS mp ON mp.[MessageId] = m.[Id] WHERE mp.[Key] LIKE @ParameterKey AND mp.[Value] LIKE @Value

data.name: HomeSetupsXml_PKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [HomeSetupsXml] ADD CONSTRAINT [PKey] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]);

data.name: TrackData_PKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [TrackData] ADD CONSTRAINT [PKey] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]);

data.name: MessageParameters
data.value: CREATE TABLE [MessageParameters] ( [Id] UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL ROWGUIDCOL, [MessageId] UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL, [Key] NTEXT NOT NULL, [Value] NTEXT NOT NULL );

data.name: InteractionsXml_PKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [InteractionsXml] ADD CONSTRAINT [PKey] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]);

data.name: TechnicalConfigurations
TrackData_Index
data.value: CREATE INDEX [TrackData_Index] ON [TrackData] ([EntityType], [EntityId]);

data.name: SelectMessageParametersByMessage
data.value: SELECT [Id],[Key],[Value] FROM [MessageParameters] WHERE [MessageId] = @MessageId

data.name: DeviceActivityLogs_PKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [DeviceActivityLogs] ADD CONSTRAINT [PKey] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]);

data.name: LogicalDevicesXml
TrackData
data.value: CREATE TABLE [TrackData] ( [Id] INT IDENTITY NOT NULL, [DeviceId] NVARCHAR(50), [Properties] NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, [Timestamp] DATETIME NOT NULL, [EventType] NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, [EntityId] NVARCHAR(75) NOT NULL, [EntityType] NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL );

data.name: Messages
data.value: CREATE TABLE [Messages] ( [Id] UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL ROWGUIDCOL, [Class] TINYINT NOT NULL, [Type] NTEXT NOT NULL, [TimeStamp] DATETIME NOT NULL, [State] TINYINT NOT NULL, [AppId] NTEXT NOT NULL, [AddInVersion] NTEXT NOT NULL, [DeviceIds] NTEXT NULL, [CapabilityIds] NTEXT NULL );

data.name: ApplicationsSettings_PKey
data.value: ALTER TABLE [ApplicationsSettings] ADD CONSTRAINT [PK_ApplicationsSettings] PRIMARY KEY ([ApplicationId], [Name]);
